localString.value: A portal glows softly before you. You wonder where it leads.
I have finally found it. When I first found the old scroll in the back of the Lich's library I could not believe an Item of such great power could truly exist.

After experimenting with the artifact I have discovered the proper spell for the summoning of fire elementals. I believe if the Elemental Forge as I have come to call it were move to another location it would produce different types of elementals but the size and weight precludes my moving it.

This morning the most amazing thing happened I summoned an elemental of a size and strength I had never before encountered. I will name it Klactog after the barbarian god of fire. Klactog is different from the other elementals I sense he may not be full under my control. I must study him closely.
